thread.title: Chelsea boss Jose Mourinho lauds Diego Costa's character - South Wales Guardian
thread.title_full: Chelsea boss Jose Mourinho lauds Diego Costa's character - South Wales Guardian - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: South Wales Guardian
title: Chelsea boss Jose Mourinho lauds Diego Costa's character - South Wales Guardian
text:
Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho is prepared to play with little flair as Chelsea seek a consistent return to winning ways Jose Mourinho has lauded the character of Diego Costa after the striker returned from his three-match suspension to inspire Chelsea to a much-needed victory. Costa was banned retrospectively for violent conduct against Arsenal and the Premier League champions' woeful start to the season was extended in his absence.
 South Wales Guardian.
